name: Woods Of SirenHead
description:
A boy named Gene goes with his father in the woods. They both go to check out Gene's mother. But they don't know that there is Siren Head in the woods., 

In this small indie horror game, you will experience a child's perspective who gets lost in the woods and Siren Head uses his traits to scare and kill him.

At the end, you may think that the game is made to kill the player, but there is an alternative ending to the story.So you have to be tricky.

________________________

Woods Of Siren Head is based on art by Trevor Henderson. So he gets the credit in the first place.

Assets and sounds from unity asset store, blendswap, and freesound
